vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Sa.14.50;
father of: Ahinoam (H0293)
§ Ahimaaz = "my brother is anger (wrath)"
1) father-in-law of Saul
2) Zadok's son who aided David during Absalom's rebellion
3) a supply officer of Solomon
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   padre de Ahinóam, esposa de Saúl; (b)   hijo de Sadoc; sumo sacerdote; tribu de Leví; (c)   gobernador; en tiempos de Salomón
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞希瑪斯 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我兄弟是怒氣 (憤怒)"
1) 掃羅的岳父 (撒上 14:50)
2) 撒督的兒子, 曾在亞沙龍叛變時協助過大衛王 (撒下 15:27,36; 17:17)
3) 負責供應大衛王和王的家人的臣子之一 (王上 4:15)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚希玛斯 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我兄弟是怒气 (愤怒)"
1) 扫罗的岳父 (撒上 14:50)
2) 撒督的儿子, 曾在亚沙龙叛变时协助过大卫王 (撒下 15:27,36; 17:17)
3) 负责供应大卫王和王的家人的臣子之一 (王上 4:15)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.15.27;
son of: Zadok (H6659);
father of: Azariah (H5838)
§ Ahimaaz = "my brother is anger (wrath)"
1) father-in-law of Saul
2) Zadok's son who aided David during Absalom's rebellion
3) a supply officer of Solomon

A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.4.15; married to Basemath (H1315)
§ Ahimaaz = "my brother is anger (wrath)"
1) father-in-law of Saul
2) Zadok's son who aided David during Absalom's rebellion
3) a supply officer of Solomon
